name: Mony
greetingText: An extremely cute person who touched my life
wishText: I hope all your dreams come true and happiness be with you always. ສຸກສັນວັນເກີດ!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you nahh!! Yayyyy! Many many success and happiness in the future...
text2: That's what I was going to do for you nah
text4: I realised that I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click if you want to watch it again.
